text: She's been subjected to a barrage of hate messages from Harry Styles'fans following reports of their rumoured romance. So whilst she initially refused to draw any attention to the claims, Tess Ward has broken her silence in a bid to stop the slew of abuse. Speaking to The Times, the 27 - year - old food blogger revealed she had been forced to delete several of her social media accounts, leaving her solely with Instagram, although she admitted she was beginning to resent that too.
